element-citation.article-title: Effects of naturally occurring prenylated flavonoids on enzymes metabolizing arachidonic acid: cyclooxygenases and lipoxygenases11 abbreviations: AA, arachidonic acid; COX, cyclooxygenase; LOX, lipoxygenase; PG, prostaglandin; TX, thromboxane; HETE, hydroxyeicosatetraenoic acid; NDGA, nordihydroguaiaretic acid; MTT, 3-(4,5-dimethylthiazol-2-yl)-2,5-diphenyltetrazolium bromide; LPS, lipopolysaccharide; DMEM, dulbecco’s modified eagle’s medium; FBS, fetal bovine serum; and PMN, polymorphonuclear leukocyte
